entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. High minus 27.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
